list.title: Feel the boost
list.subtitle: Pedal-assist electric bikes make riding easy: the harder you pedal, the more boost you get.

list.title: Hop on and go
list.subtitle: Electric scooters on demand help you go farther and get there faster while having fun.

list.title: Park easily
list.subtitle: Return your e-bike or e-scooter wherever your ride takes you, on a bike rack or sidewalk away from pedestrian walkways.
